inclusion.criterion: Age birth to 21.0 years of age at the time of entry into the protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of mastocytosis by skin examination or histologic evidence in a skin or bone marrow biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has a primary medical care provider outside the NIH
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject or parent or guardian is able to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A biological relative with or without the diagnosis of mastocytosis by skin examination or histologic evidence in a skin or bone marrow biopsy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Age greater than or equal to 21.0 years
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 53-year-old man with Paget's disease of bone, which makes them likely ineligible for the trial.
